## P4 projects

```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(fs)

foldes <- dir_ls(type = "directory")


expand_folder <- function(folder) {
  c(
    list(tags$dt(folder)),
    purrr::map(dir_ls(folder, regexp = "\\.html$"), ~ tags$dd(tags$a(.x, href = .x)))
  )
}

```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
withTags(
  dl(
    purrr::map(foldes, expand_folder)
  )
)
```
